Name: Hovercraft Drive
About the game: Hovercraft Drive is the ultimate free-range hovercraft adventure. Explore three sprawling scenic environments: Hills, Dunes and Tundra with a modern hovercraft with exceptional handling. Perfect for casual gamers.
